events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it because the product does not meet my expectations. How do I get a refund?
The request was identified as related to a refund and return process based on the customer's initial message.
A customer service agent was assigned to handle the refund case and respond to the customer's inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
In order to start the refund process, I need the order number and details on the product you wish to return.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product is a kitchen blender that I found different from the description.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process for your order. You will receive an email with the return instructions shortly.
Thanks for helping me so quickly. I appreciate the clear instructions and the refund support.
Your refund case has been processed successfully. Please follow the return steps in your email to complete the refund.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you completed the return process and have no further issues with your refund.
Since the refund process was completed and no further concerns were raised, we are now closing your case. Thank you!
We have sent you a quick satisfaction survey to hear about your experience with our support team.
